video_prompt: A young East Asian woman, positioned facing forward, slowly shifts her pensive gaze as a soft, almost imperceptible smile gently blooms on her lips. Her wispy bangs subtly sway with a faint breeze. Her gracefully intertwined hands beneath her chin subtly adjust, fingers shifting. In the blurred background, warm golden fairy lights gently twinkle and shimmer. Outside the window, distant out-of-focus lights subtly drift and glow, casting a faint, shifting light. The soft, warm illumination subtly changes, causing gentle shadows on her face to deepen or soften, enhancing her features.
image_prompt:
A close-up portrait of a young East Asian woman, facing viewer with a gentle, serene, and slightly pensive expression, hands gracefully intertwined beneath her chin. She has long, dark brown hair with soft wispy bangs, adorned with a delicate blue and iridescent floral hair clip above her right ear. Fair skin, large dark brown eyes with subtle highlights, soft pink lips with a hint of a smile. She wears a light-colored top with a vivid pattern of large red and deep maroon flowers and green leaves.

Softly blurred background with shallow depth of field. On the left, an evening window view with distant, out-of-focus city lights (bokeh), including an oval light. On the right, rich, dark red curtains with vertical folds. Numerous warm golden string lights (fairy lights) are draped vertically throughout the background, creating a magical bokeh effect as soft, luminous orbs.

Soft, warm, diffused lighting, creating an ethereal, inviting, and tranquil evening atmosphere. Dominant color palette of warm reds, golds, and browns.
refined_video_prompt: A young East Asian woman's pensive gaze slowly shifts, evolving into a soft, almost imperceptible smile. Her wispy bangs subtly sway. Fingers gently adjust beneath her chin. In the blurred background, warm golden fairy lights twinkle and shimmer. Outside, distant out-of-focus lights softly drift and glow, casting a shifting illumination that deepens and softens facial shadows, enhancing her features.
